name: Thirsty Scholar Pub
notes: This laid-back bar offers $1 oysters every Tuesday. The deal starts at 4 p.m. and goes until they run out.

name: Sal + Stone
notes: Salt + Stone in Somerville’s Assembly Row offers $1 oysters at the bar from Monday through Friday, 3 to 5 p.m.

name: Warren Tavern
notes: Find $1 oysters at historic Charlestown spot Warren Tavern — which has counted George Washington and Paul Revere among its patrons — every weekday from 3 to 6 p.m.

name: Viale
notes: Central Square restaurant Viale is shucking $1 oysters daily from 5 to 7 p.m.

name: State Street Provisions
notes: Located along Boston’s landmark Long Wharf, State Street Provisions shucks oysters for $1 apiece every weeknight from 3 to 5 p.m.

name: Carrie Nation Cocktail Club
notes: Swanky Beacon Hill spot Carrie Nation offers $1 oysters Tuesday through Thursday, 4 to 7 p.m.
